states.passed: There were no missing values found in the training data.
states.fixed:
The training data had the following missing values which were resolved.

Please review your data source for data quality issues and possibly filter out the rows with these missing values.

If the missing values are expected, you can either accept the above imputation, or implement your own custom imputation that may be more appropriate based on the data type and business process.

states.done: Each iteration of the trained model was validated through cross-validation.
Your input data has been split into a training dataset and a holdout test dataset for validation of the model. The test holdout dataset reflects the original distribution of your input data.

states.passed: Your inputs were analyzed, and no high cardinality features were detected.
states.done: High cardinality inputs were detected in dataset and were featurized as {}.

states.passed: Classes are balanced in the training data.
states.alerted: Classes in the training data are imbalanced.

num_of_samples.name: number of samples in the training data
